name: Tech World Capital
overview: Tech World Capital’s Telecom division produces and promotes multi-network hardware and software services focused on wireless and voice over internet protocol (VOIP) products, including GSM / CDMA - VoIP - WIFI - POTS technology. Tech World’s patent pending technology has developed a new service which allows users to bridge their current cell phones, Wi-Fi phones, POTS phones and calling cards directly to the Internet for domestic and international calling. Tech World also offers several innovative technology solutions that allows users of any telephone network (Cellular, Wi-Fi, VoIP and POTS) to call internationally without using expensive cellular international termination networks, but uses Tech World’s termination network to provide international calling at rates even lower than those offered by Skype, for non Skype-to-Skype calling.

acquisition.source_description: Mistral Ventures, Inc. Signs LOI to Acquire Assets of Tech World Capital, Inc.
